q:
What is the output of the following Python 3 code:

l = ['12', '34', '5']
t = tuple(map(list,(list(set(l)))))
print(sorted(t, key = lambda q:(q[-1])))

  2. You can use the packages by using the Ruby programming language and gems as a ZIP.
  3. You can use pip to install any Python packages.

What are the recommended tips while using AWS?                              

  • a. Write your Lambda function code in a stateless style.
  • b. Always declare any function variable outside the scope of the handler.
  • c. Never delete old Lambda functions when no longer required.

a. Write your Lambda function code in a stateless style.

b. Always declare any function variable outside the scope of the handler.

c. Never delete old Lambda functions when no longer required.
